item.title: ZAPCon 2022 Call - for Papers
item.description: ZAPCon is returning for its second year! The second annual ZAP user conference will take place on March 8, 2022 and the Call for Papers is open!.

item.title: 1st Ever ZAPCon - Call For Papers
item.description: Today we are calling for topics and speakers in the first-ever OWASP ZAP User Conference!
